/hr/tccr.io-truecharts-authelia.title: authelia helm release
/hr/tccr.io-truecharts-authelia.name: authelia
/hr/tccr.io-truecharts-authelia.doc: Authelia is an open-source authentication and authorization server and portal fulfilling the identity and access management (IAM) role of information security in providing multi-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal. It acts as a companion for common reverse proxies.

0:
config:
  bind: 0.0.0.0:{{ .Values.service.main.ports.main.port }}
  onlineMode: true
  debug: true
  query:
    enabled: true
    port: {{ .Values.service.main.ports.query.port }}
    showPlugins: false
  lite:
    enabled: true
    routes:
      - host: [modpack.${DOMAIN_0}]
        backend: minecraft-modpack-minecraft-java.minecraft.svc.cluster.local:25565
        cachePingTTL: -1s
        fallback:
          motd: |
            §cModpack server is offline.
            §eCheck back later!
          version:
            name: '§cTry again later!'
            protocol: -1
          favicon: /icons/server-icon.png
      - host: [tcpshield.${DOMAIN_0}, ${DOMAIN_0}]
        backend: minecraft-vanilla-minecraft-java.minecraft.svc.cluster.local:25565
        cachePingTTL: -1s
        fallback:
          motd: |
            §cModpack server is offline.
            §eCheck back later!
          version:
            name: '§cTry again later!'
            protocol: -1
          favicon: /icons/server-icon.png
Master of Science in Electrical Engineering and Information Technology

trap 'exit' INT TERM
while [ 1 ]; do
  sleep 600 &
  wait $!
done
